TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ServiceNotificationFilterDescription extends System.Object

summary.para: Represents a class that is used to describe a filter for service notification delivery, registered via .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.para: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public ServiceNotificationFilterDescription (Uri name, bool matchNamePrefix, bool matchPrimaryChangeOnly);
.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Uri name, bool matchNamePrefix, bool matchPrimaryChangeOnly) cil managed
Public Sub New (name As Uri, matchNamePrefix As Boolean, matchPrimaryChangeOnly As Boolean)
public: ServiceNotificationFilterDescription(Uri ^ name, bool matchNamePrefix, bool matchPrimaryChangeOnly);

param.name: name
param.para: The name for which service notifications should be delivered.

param.name: matchNamePrefix
param.para: Flag that indicates whether all service notifications for which Name is a prefix will be delivered.

param.name: matchPrimaryChangeOnly
param.para: Flag that indicates whether to match the service notification delivery by filtering out notifications in which the primary replica endpoint has not changed. This flag has no effect for stateless services.

summary.para: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: member this.MatchNamePrefix : bool with get, set
public: property bool MatchNamePrefix { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
public: property bool MatchNamePrefix { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.para: Gets a value that indicates whether all service notifications for which Name is a prefix will be delivered.

value.para: true if all service notification for which Name is a prefix will be delivered; otherwise, false. The default is false.

Docs.remarks: The prefix match occurs as a URI segment prefix match rather than a string prefix match against service names. A filter with the name "fabric:/abc" will prefix match services named "fabric:/abc" and "fabric:/abc/def", but not a service named "fabric:/abc_def".

MemberSignature.Value: member this.MatchPrimaryChangeOnly : bool with get, set
public: property bool MatchPrimaryChangeOnly { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
public: property bool MatchPrimaryChangeOnly { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.para: Gets a value that indicates whether to match the service notification delivery by filtering out notifications in which the primary replica endpoint has not changed. This flag has no effect for stateless services.

value.para: true if the filtering matches primary change only; otherwise, false. The default is false.

MemberSignature.Value: member this.Name : Uri with get, set
public: property Uri ^ Name { Uri ^ get(); void set(Uri ^ value); };

summary.para: Gets the name for which service notifications should be delivered. The name must be in the fabric: scheme. The root name ("fabric:") is allowed.

value.para: The name for which service notifications should be delivered.
